cui_name: Stage II Colorectal Cancer AJCC v7
reasoning: AJCC v7 Stage II colorectal cancer incidence estimated from global colorectal cancer incidence (~20-25 per 100k) with Stage II comprising approximately 30-35% of cases at diagnosis. AJCC v7 staging has slightly different criteria than TNM alone, resulting in slightly lower Stage II estimate (~8.2 per 100k). Confidence reflects derivation from proportional staging rather than direct AJCC v7-specific registry.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
